name: Island (itch) (Shinzou)
description:
Islands is an strategy game . You have one mission " Destroy all enemies "

- 5 different types of turrets are avalabile to use each of them has a different health and damage values,

- In order to construct a weapon you have to click one of your island and select it from the shop menu

- Rotate the weapon with [A] and [D]

-[Mouse1] to place it
